title: X-Metaverse
author: X-Metaverse
content: The invasion of monsters and the intensification of Loth-Wolf’s foreign invasion have made every force in the Knight Galaxy more closely connected. At the same time, frequent trade and wars etc. have also led to constant friction between the forces of Knight Galaxy. In order to fully cope with the political instability and create a peaceful development space, the Alliance decided to start a space battleship renovation and upgrade program.Commanders can spend a certain amount of XMETA to upgrade the rarity of the original space battleship and reset the space battleship skill refresh through the battleship renovation function, up to a SR-rated battleship!In addition to this Medium article, you can also view the video tutorials we have posted on Youtube.🧰 Materials to be prepared1. Space Battleship NFT;2. MetaMask/ WalletConnect wallet with enough XMETA tokens balance.🔢 Retrofit consumption and probability🚉 Tutorials1. Click “MARKET”-”MY NFT”-”RETROFIT”.2. Select 1 battleship that you want to retrofit.3. Select the target rarity you want to retrofit, different rarity corresponds to have a different probability of success.4. Click “RETROFIT” to start the space battleship upgrades. Note: The XMETA tokens will be deducted from the on-chain wallet instead of using the in-game account.5. Space battleship retrofitting success. After successful retrofitting, the battleship needs MINT to be used.6. You can click “GO TO MINT” in the retrofitting success page to go MINT page directly; or click “MARKET”-”GAME PACKAGE “ — “SPACE BATTLESHIP” — “MINT”, go to the MINT page.7. Select the retrofitting successful space battleship and click “MINT”, you will get a new battleship.🔎 FAQQ1: Is battleship refit an irreversible action?Yes, this action is not reversible. If your space battleship has gems set on it during the retrofit, the gems will be missing; and the space battleship level also be reset, so please confirm before retrofit!Q2: Are there any restrictions on battleship retrofitting?No. There are no restrictions, including but not limited to the maximum level of the battleship to be rebuilt, the maximum number of times a user refit per day, and other restrictions.Q3: What kind of results will be generated if my network environment changes during the battleship retrofitting process? And how can i If the results are not displayed directly?Space Battleship refit approved by the on-chain contracts, as long as your contract request is successful, the final result will be displayed in the package. You can also view your retrofit history at the “RETROFIT RECORD” in the upper right corner of the retrofit page.Q4: Is the new battleship is the same NFT as the old one after the space battleship retrofit, and the battleship level will be reset?It’s not the same NFT, only the battleship type is the same, everything else is new.About X-MetaverseX-Metaverse is a blockchain 3D game that runs on Android, IOS and PC. All game contents and characters are based on Blockchain tokens and NFTs. X-Metaverse’s visuals and gameplay are inspired by Starcraft and Star Wars. Players will be immersed in the vast expanse of space, spending time cultivating different races, Upgrading ships, reaching more galaxies and collecting rare materials. The most exciting part is that you can earn cryptocurrency with other players through actions such as conquest, exploration, competition, mining, production, breeding and combat.Follow X-Metaverse via its official media channels and be the first to hear the latest updates:Website：https://www.x-metaverse.org/Twitter：https://twitter.com/XMetaverse_Discord：http://discord.gg/x-metaverseMedium：https://medium.com/@X-MetaverseYouTube：https://www.youtube.com/c/XMetaverseTelegram：https://t.me/XMetaverse_officialTelegram Channel：https://t.me/XMetaverse_Channel
